response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for you. I understand its worth to you is $1,000,000, and I am eager to ensure you receive it at a fair price. My offer for this exceptional product is $950,000. This opportunity not only allows you to secure an asset of great value but also leaves room for negotiation if needed. I am confident that together we can find a solution that meets both our needs. Please let me know your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
